title: Cloud monitoring
description: Cross-platform and multi-cloud visibility and analytics.

docs.description: Learn how to monitor AWS logs (VPC Flow and S3 access) and metrics (billing and EC2).
Learn how to monitor Azure billing metrics and activity logs.

title: DevOps
description: Observe your entire software lifecycle — from development to production.

docs.description: Get better visibility into your CI/CD pipelines.
Leverage the Elastic Common Schema logging libraries to automatically link application traces to their corresponding logs.

title: AIOps
description: Automate anomaly detection and accelerate root cause analysis.

docs.description: Learn about Elastic’s artificial intelligence for IT operations and machine learning capabilities for root cause analysis.
Automatically identify the probable causes of slow or failed transactions.

title: User experience
description: Measure, gauge, and improve your end users’ experience.

docs.description: Simulate critical user workflows on a regular interval to catch bugs before your users report them.
Learn how to track Core Web Vitals and how to use them to quantify the real-world user experience.
